comments:
Eclipse version >= Build id: I20070828-0800

Steps To Reproduce:

(1) Open "Plug-ins" view
(2) Double-click on "org.eclipse.jdt"
(3) Go to the "Extensions" page
    -> BUG:  "Up" button is enabled
    -> EXPECTED:  "Up" button is disabled
       - "Down" button should be disabled in a similar fashion
    -> Note:  Editor is not editable
    -> Pressing the "Up" button a number of times yields the following
       exception:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.plugin.ExtensionsSection.handleMove(ExtensionsSection.java:1091)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.plugin.ExtensionsSection.buttonSelected(ExtensionsSection.java:308)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.TreeSection$PartAdapter.buttonSelected(TreeSection.java:38)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.parts.SharedPartWithButtons$SelectionHandler.buttonSelected(SharedPartWithButtons.java:35)
...

This is no longer a problem.
Fix from Bug # 196867 appears to have resolved this problem.
